Name: Sacred Zodongga Defense
About the game: The island of Zodongga lay undisturbed for a thousand years, only the natives of the Hulla-Balla-Bazooki tribe inhabited the dense jungles and although fierce warriors they managed to live in peace and harmony with nature. Tales of a fabulous banana plantations located in the inhospitable mountains of Zodongga inevitably reached the four corners of civilization and humanity’s greed (and taste for bananas) proved too strong to resist. Ships full of soldiers and explorers set sail to find the legendary island. One morning the tribesmen saw the invasion force suddenly appear on the horizon. They quickly mobilized their warriors and prepared their defenses for the onslaught that was about to hit them. The invaders come in waves and different nations send in their best troops. As the chieftain (The Big Kahuna) of the Hulla-Balla-Bazooki tribe you have to organize the defenders and place your ambushes strategically. “Alla Balla Hukka Gadai, Aka Cikala Ahana”. Liberally translated from local language: “When the monkey looks upon the mountain, he thinks of bananas...' Sacred Zodongga Defense is a 3D Tower Defense game with a fantasy theme. The game features: - 100+ different levels - 3 difficulty settings (hard, intermediate and easy) - Unlock New Towers and encounter new enemies as you progress - Every level has a boss with special abilities to beat - A generous amount of bananas....
